channel.title: Crashed My Server
channel.description: Yesturday i was running my server (max players = 1000000 just so these nulls wont be able to crash my server) and i had bout 200 players. And server had no lagg at all. So it was not the lagg. We were playing and KBAM! The server goes offline. Now everytime i do runserver my pc fkin laggs like hell and it says online but when i wanna log into my server i cant. Does anyone know whats going on? Or does anyone know a sollution?

item.title: Crashed My Server
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

And what do you suggest me to do?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 31, 2008, 03:12:12 am[/size][hr]Cmon guyz post something

Read full topic

item.title: Crashed My Server
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

It’s because of wL’s poor player-handling design. His framework wasn’t meant to be abused like it is these days; it was only to further RuneScape emulation.

Read full topic
